faqs.question: What types of gadgets do you sell?
faqs.answer: At Gadget Haven, we offer a wide range of electronic gadgets including smartphones, smartwatches, headphones, gaming accessories, home automation devices, and more. We strive to provide the latest technology at competitive prices.

faqs.question: How can I place an order?
faqs.answer: Simply browse through our products, select the items you wish to purchase, and add them to your cart. Once you're ready, proceed to checkout, enter your shipping details, and choose your preferred payment method.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept a variety of payment methods including credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. Shipping charges and delivery times vary depending on the destination. Please check our shipping policy for more details.

faqs.question: How do I track my order?
faqs.answer: Once your order is shipped, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can use this tracking number on our website or the carrier's site to track your order's status.

faqs.question: Can I cancel or modify my order?
faqs.answer: Orders can be modified or canceled within 24 hours of placing the order. After that, the order is processed and cannot be changed. Please contact our customer support team immediately if you need assistance.

faqs.question: Do you offer a warranty on your products?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our products come with a manufacturer's warranty, which typically ranges from 6 months to 1 year. The warranty covers manufacturing defects but does not include damage caused by misuse or accidents.

faqs.question: How do I return or exchange an item?
faqs.answer: If you're not satisfied with your purchase, we offer a 30-day return policy. Items must be unused and in their original packaging. To initiate a return or exchange, contact our customer support team with your order details.

faqs.question: Are there any discounts or promotions available?
faqs.answer: Yes! We frequently offer seasonal sales, discounts for first-time buyers, and promotional codes. Be sure to subscribe to our newsletter and follow us on social media for the latest offers.

faqs.question: How do I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach our customer support team by email at support@gadgethaven.com or through our live chat service available on the website. We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.
